Translations.Text: Anriyum, "ninkal allahvukku etiraka unkalai uyarttik kollatirkal; niccayamaka nan unkalitam telivana canrukalutan vantirukkinren
anriyum, "ennai ninkal kallerintu kollatirukkum poruttu nan, ennutaiya iraivanum unkalutaiya iraivanumakiya avanitame niccayamakap patukaval tetukiren
melum, ninkal en mitu nampikkai kollavillaiyayin ennai vittu vilakik kollankal" (enru musa kurinar)
(avarkal varampu miriyavarkalakave iruntarkal). "Niccayamaka ivarkal kurravalikalana camukattarakave irukkirarkal" enru tam iraivanitam pirarttittuk kurinar
en atiyarkalai (alaittu)k kontu, iravil nir (veritam) celka niccayamaka ninkala pin totarappatuvirkal" (enru iraivan kurinan)
anriyum. Akkatalaip pilavullatakave vittuc cellum, niccayamaka avarkal (atil) mulkatikkappata ventiya pataiyinarakave irukkinrarkal (enak kuri" iraivan hpir'avnaiyum avan pataiyinaraiyum mulkatittan)
ettanai tottankalaiyum, nir urrukkalaiyum avarkal vittuc cenrarkal
innum (ettanaiyo) vilainilankalaiyum nerttiyana malikaikalaiyum (vittuc cenrarkal)
innum avarkal inpamaka anupavittuk kontirunta cukanupavankalaiyum (vittuc cenrarkal)
avvare (mutivu erpattatum) avarrirku veru camukattarai varicaka nam akkinom
akave, avarkalukkaka vanamum pumiyum alavumillai (tappittuk kolla) avakacamum kotukkappattavarkalakavum avarkalillai
nam israyilin cantatiyai ilivu tarum vetanaiyiliruntum tittamakak kapparrinom
Hpir'avnai vittum (kapparrinom) niccayamaka avan anavam kontavanaka, varampu miriyavanaka iruntan
niccayamaka, nam nanku terinte avarkalai ulaka makkaliliruntu terntetuttom
anriyum, nam avarkalukku attatcikalai kotuttom; avarril tulakkamana cotanai iruntatu
niccayamaka avarkal (makka kahpirkal) kurukirarkal
enkalukku mutalil erpatum maranattait tavira veru etuvumillai nankal mintum eluppatupavarkal allar
ninkal unmaiyalarkalaka iruntal, enkal mutataiyarai (tirumpak) kontu varunkal
ivarkalum mela? Allatu'tuppa'u camukattarkalum, avarkalukku munnaruntavarkaluma? Niccayamaka avarkal pavam ceypavarkalakave iruntarkal; (akave) avarkalai nam alittom
melum, vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum ivvirantirkum itaiye ullavarraiyum vilaiyattirkaka nam pataikkavillai
ivvirantaiyum, cattiyattaik konteyanri nam pataikkavillai. Eninum avarkalil perumpalor (itai) ariyamattarkal
